entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border this evening. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 in wind prone areas in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Snow near the British Columbia border. Amount 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 in wind prone areas. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
